nodes.text: The Talisman of Age was one of the Talismans of Transformation, shapeshifting talismans owned by the Witches of Dathomir. The Nightsisters used the Talisman of Age to tap into the animal nature of Humans to restore the vigor of their youth for a brief moment. Like all Nightsister artifacts, it was thought to work through the powers of the Spirits, beings said to be from a parallel realm in Nightsister mythology. In her book Wild Power, Mother Talzin wrote about the talisman and its effects.
The Talisman of Age was mentioned in the 2012 reference book Book of Sith: Secrets from the Dark Side, written by Daniel Wallace.
